scripts.build: npm run deploy && npm run setContractRoyalties eqmusic && npm run genAcct1 && npm run genAcct2 && npm run genAcct3 && npm run createProfileRapta && npm run createProfileEQKeys && npm run seed1 && npm run seed2
scripts.profiles: npm run createProfile1 && npm run createProfile2
scripts.mintAll: flow transactions build ./transactions/txn.mintAll.cdc --proposer eqmusic --payer eqmusic --authorizer $npm_config_signer --authorizer eqmusic --filter payload --save multi-signer-txns/tx.MintNFT1
scripts.mintNFT: flow transactions build ./transactions/txn.mintNFT.cdc --proposer eqmusic --payer eqmusic --authorizer $npm_config_signer --authorizer eqmusic --filter payload --save multi-signer-txns/tx.MintNFT1
scripts.mintSign: flow transactions sign multi-signer-txns/tx.MintNFT1 --signer $npm_config_signer --filter payload --save multi-signer-txns/tx.MintNFT2 && flow transactions sign multi-signer-txns/tx.MintNFT2 --signer eqmusic --filter payload --save multi-signer-txns/tx.MintNFT3 && flow transactions send-signed multi-signer-txns/tx.MintNFT3
scripts.createProfileRapta1: flow transactions build ./transactions/txn.createProfile1.cdc --proposer eqmusic --payer eqmusic --authorizer rapta --authorizer eqmusic --filter payload --save multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileRapta1
scripts.createProfileRapta2: flow transactions sign multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileRapta1 --signer rapta --filter payload --save multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileRapta2
scripts.createProfileRapta3: flow transactions sign multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileRapta2 --signer eqmusic --filter payload --save multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileRapta3
scripts.createProfileRapta: npm run createProfileRapta1 && npm run createProfileRapta2 && npm run createProfileRapta3 && flow transactions send-signed multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileRapta3
scripts.createProfileEQKeys1: flow transactions build ./transactions/txn.createProfile2.cdc --proposer eqmusic --payer eqmusic --authorizer eqkeys --authorizer eqmusic --filter payload --save multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileEQKeys1
scripts.createProfileEQKeys2: flow transactions sign multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileEQKeys1 --signer eqkeys --filter payload --save multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileEQKeys2
scripts.createProfileEQKeys3: flow transactions sign multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileEQKeys2 --signer eqmusic --filter payload --save multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileEQKeys3
scripts.createProfileEQKeys: npm run createProfileEQKeys1 && npm run createProfileEQKeys2 && npm run createProfileEQKeys3 && flow transactions send-signed multi-signer-txns/tx.CreateProfileEQKeys3
